page.title: 05CLUBS IN BADINGHAM/DENNINGTN
page.content: Clubs are important in village life, enabling people to meet socially & often as the only local source of entertainment. Dennington has a Sports Club with its own sports field, an Over 60's Club, a Children's Church Club & a Women's Institute. Badingham village hall is the meeting place for their Women's Institute, the Youth Club, Brownies, Autumn Leaves & fortnightly whist drives. A bowls club adjoins the White Horse. Most adults in Badingham belong to Badingham Community Council & elect an Executive Committee annually. They run regular events such as the Harvest Supper, Summer Fete, Bonfire & children's Christmas parties and finance & distribute free to all residents a bi-monthly magazine "Badingham Echo". They organise a community bus service.
